node.title: Dramatic arrest on Sydney bridge linked to alleged Stuart MacGill kidnapping
node.description: Police say the arrest of a 28-year-old man on the Anzac Bridge yesterday came as part of an investigation into the alleged kidnapping of aÂ former Test cricket star.
node.content:
["A man wanted by police in connection to the alleged kidnapping of former Test cricket star Stuart MacGill has been arrested on the side of a busy Sydney highway.", "Zachary Ahmad El Kheir, 28, was arrested after an alleged pursuit on the Anzac Bridge at Pyrmont about 3:15pm yesterday.", "The ABC understands Mr El Kheir\u00a0is believed to be the previously unknown person dubbed \"Sonny\", who detectives have been searching for since Mr MacGill's alleged kidnapping in April.", "Mr El Kheir\u00a0is not accused of being involved in the kidnapping incident itself.", "Police allege officers attempted to stop a silver Toyota Camry driven by Mr El Kheir\u00a0in Laycock Street, Neutral Bay, about 2:50pm.", "", "
Zacahary Ahmad El Kheir was arrested yesterday at Casula.(Supplied: NSW Police)
", "They alleged\u00a0the vehicle failed to stop and rammed a police car before fleeing.", "The Camry\u00a0was successfully pulled over soon after and Mr El Kheir was arrested on the side of the road, with an amount of cocaine allegedly found\u00a0inside the vehicle.", "At the same time as the arrest, police stormed a home in Casula and\u00a0allegedly\u00a0seized\u00a0a revolver, ammunition, more than 956g of cocaine and $300,000 in cash.", "Mr El Kheir was taken to Newtown police station and charged with several drug and firearm offences.", "", "
NSW Police say Stuart MacGill was forced into a car on Sydney's North Shore and driven to a rundown property at Bringelly earlier in 2021.(ABC News)
", "The charges\u00a0include using a\u00a0offensive weapon to prevent lawful detention, supply prohibited drug, possess prohibited drug, knowingly deal with proceeds of crime, possess unregistered firearm, and possess ammunition without holding a licence.", "He was refused bail overnight to appear at Newtown Local Court on Thursday.", "Mr El Kheir was arrested as part of investigations by Strike Force Cain, which has been probing the alleged kidnapping of Mr MacGill from near his Cremorne home on April 14.", "Several men, including the brother of Mr MacGill's\u00a0partner, have previously been arrested over the incident in which the retired cricketer was allegedly detained at a property in the city's south-west."]
